h2_title: Best Spirits to Use in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Though this definitely doesn't start as the best spirit in the game as Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang, if you find and defeat all 6 frog bosses, you can upgrade this spirit to Mythical level where it becomes Baw-Baw-Lang-Lang. When it reaches Mythical status, you essentially have a frog randomizer that deals elemental damage. Tongue Whip becomes an attack, where a different version of the frog bosses will appear, allowing you to inflict Lightning, Ice, Poison, or Fire. The last option is a Stone frog, that will howl and roar.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Spirits_to_Use.md', within the main section titled 'Best Spirits to Use', specifically from the subsection 'Best Spirits to Use in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang/Baw-Baw-Lang-Lang'.
The content is as follows:
Though this definitely doesn't start as the best spirit in the game as Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang, if you find and defeat all 6 frog bosses, you can upgrade this spirit to Mythical level where it becomes Baw-Baw-Lang-Lang. When it reaches Mythical status, you essentially have a frog randomizer that deals elemental damage. Tongue Whip becomes an attack, where a different version of the frog bosses will appear, allowing you to inflict Lightning, Ice, Poison, or Fire. The last option is a Stone frog, that will howl and roar.
